sentences: Ib Niels Carl Glindemann Nielsen (September 27, 1934 â€“ April 5, 2019) was a Danish jazz musician, the  leader of the Ib Glindemann Orchestra (a big band modeled after the Stan Kenton Orchestra).
When in Europe, saxophonist Stan Getz was a frequent guest star of the orchestra.
